```{r 29938394, include=FALSE}

PMID_29938394 <- RefManageR::ReadPubMed('29938394', database = 'PubMed')

citation_29938394 <- paste0(PMID_29938394$journal,' ', PMID_29938394$year, ' ', PMID_29938394$month,';', PMID_29938394$volume,'(', PMID_29938394$number,'):', PMID_29938394$pages)

PubMed_29938394 <- paste0(PubMedString, PMID_29938394$eprint)

doi_29938394 <- paste0(doiString, PMID_29938394$doi)

dimensionBadge_29938394 <- paste0(dimensionString1, PMID_29938394$doi,dimensionString2)

altmetricBadge_29938394 <- paste0(altmetricString1, PMID_29938394$doi, altmetricString2 )

```
